navbar.founders: Technical Team and Board of Directors
navbar.volunteerSuccess: Thank you {{name}}! You are now registered as a volunteer. We will contact you soon.

footer.mission: Health monitoring, organization, understanding, and resolution of health issues in our communities.

index.startBuilding: Start building your amazing project here!

auth.loginDesc: Sign in to become a volunteer
auth.signupDesc: Create your account to join our mission

payment.thankYouDesc: Your contribution will help us continue our mission for better community health.
payment.title: Make a Donation
payment.subtitle: Support our mission for better community health
payment.messagePlaceholder: A message to accompany your donation...
payment.security: ðŸ”’ Your information is secure and will only be used to process your donation.

home.welcomeResources: Thank you for joining our mission. Here are exclusive resources for our volunteers:

resources.manualDesc: Comprehensive guide to start your engagement

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.desc: Discover our mission, vision, and values that guide our daily actions
commitment.missionDesc: Improve the health and well-being of communities by monitoring, organizing, understanding, and solving health challenges through innovative and collaborative approaches.
commitment.visionDesc: A world where every community has access to quality healthcare, adequate nutrition, health education, and optimal hygiene conditions.
commitment.valuesDesc: Integrity, compassion, innovation, transparency, and collaboration. We believe in the importance of community engagement and respect for human dignity.

areas.title: Our Areas of Intervention
areas.desc: Four essential pillars to transform community health

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.desc: Together, we can create a lasting positive impact on the health of our communities. Your commitment makes a difference.

hero.title: Our Work
hero.desc: Discover our 2024-2026 strategic plan and our priority intervention areas to transform community health.

ourWork.planTitle: An Integrated Approach to Community Health
ourWork.planDesc: Our strategic plan is built around four priority areas, with a holistic approach that recognizes the interconnection between health, nutrition, education, and the environment.

areas.communityHealthDesc: Epidemiological monitoring and improvement of local health systems
areas.nutritionDesc: Nutrition programs and fight against malnutrition
areas.educationDesc: Awareness and training for health promotion
areas.washDesc: Improving access to drinking water and sanitation facilities

ourWork.impactDesc: Our commitment is part of a long-term vision of sustainable transformation of community health systems, with a focus on sustainability and community empowerment.
ourWork.impactDurabilityDesc: Sustainable solutions adapted to local contexts

founders.heroDesc: Meet the passionate team bringing the HealthMOUR mission to life, composed of international experts united by a common vision.
founders.behindDesc: Discover the vision and commitment that gave birth to HealthMOUR
founders.founderBio: Public health physician with over 15 years of experience in developing community health programs in Africa and Europe. Passionate about the holistic approach to health, he created HealthMOUR to address contemporary health challenges through innovative and sustainable solutions.
founders.founderEducation: Doctorate in Public Health, University of POINT G Bamako
founders.teamDesc: A multicultural and multidisciplinary team bringing expertise and passion to every HealthMOUR project
founders.joinDesc: Do you share our passion for community health? We are always looking for committed talent to strengthen our team.

habibatou.role: Strategic Communication Professional for Organizations, Projects, Development and Change

fatoumata.speciality: Medical doctor with a Master 2 in Public Health specializing in nutrition. Since 2023, I have been with CHAI (Clinton Health Access Initiative), first as an intern, then as a program assistant from August 2024. Since April 2025, I have also been a coordinator at Large and Long-lasting Impact Seekers at Scale and Company (Llissco. SAS), where I supervise technical assistance to ANAES for the accreditation visits of community health centers (CSCom).
